subject: Suits and Litigation
Basketball
Libel and Slander
Basketball (College)
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: Two men who say they were molested by the former Syracuse assistant basketball coach Bernie Fine sued the university and the head coach, Jim Boeheim, for defamation.
snippet: Two men who say they were molested by the former Syracuse assistant basketball coach Bernie Fine sued the university and the head coach, Jim Boeheim, for defamation.
